item.description:
Ok dungeoneers, try this on for size.

Instead of doing the boring same-old, same-old meetup, for August United D&D Meetup day, the Boston D&D Meetup Group is going to TOMB!

What's TOMB? See the link below, but if you want to know right now, it's an interactive dungeonesque experience like True Dungeon http://www.truedungeo... if you've been to GenCon.

Why is it cool? Because it gives everyone a chance to see how people really play before they get in your game!

This promises to be a really fun meetup so come on out and bring the whole family. TOMB is a kid-friendly experience so spouses and young gamers-in-training can have a blast too.

NOTE: There is no fee from the Boston D&D Meetup, but TOMB charges $20 for adults and $16 for kids 12 and under.

If you'd rather not spend the money, don't feel left out, we'll be heading over to Quizno's or DeAngelo's afterwards for sandwiches.

Hopefully Boston weather won't spoil the day, but this is a great event to game, meet new gamers, and discover one of Boston's more interesting locales.

For more information, see http://5-wits.com/...

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: United Dungeons & Dragons August Meetup Day
